product_name: SRAM X0 10-Speed Grip Shifters - Double / Triple
long_description: SRAM X0 10-speed grip shifters deliver simple, fast shifts with a flick of a wrist, all with a low-profile, lightweight and tough design that'll be at home on any trail. All-metal indexing delivers precise shifts with positive feel; shifter rotates on 3 rows of ball bearings for smooth action with minimal effort as well as excellent longevity. Twist design enables the full range of up/down shifts so you can jump a bunch of gears in one go (instead of one-at-a-time with trigger setups). Also, the design provides a low-profile look with plenty of clearance for brake and/or handlebar remote levers. Exact Actuation design takes the 1:1 actuation ratio of cable travel/derailleur movement and optimizes it for easy, dependable setup and 10-speed application. Includes an integrated lock-on grip system, which can be converted to work with other lock-on grips. Choose between either 2x or 3x 10-speed drivetrains; compatible with all SRAM 2x or 3x 10-speed Exact Actuation derailleurs. The X0 10-Speed Grip Shifters are sold as a set (front and rear shifters) and come with cables and housing.
